name: RisingWater: The only solution is to go up
name_original: RisingWater: The only solution is to go up
description:
This is a game made for a game jam - 

Dev League Round 5 Theme: The Only Way is Up

Because the theme was "The only way is up" I though of tsunami's and water for some reason. So I made this game. This game is about you trying to get to an stuck helicopter so you can escape but the only way to get to it is by collecting wood from the map. (The game was made in hurry)

THE GAME IS POSSIBLE

Controls:
WASD - Move
LClick - Pickup some wood / food
E - Place some platforms on top of the building
